definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer

sentences.english: A major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: At the awards ceremony, the "Lifetime Achievement Award" went to Fu Zhengyi.
sentences.chinese: 在頒獎典禮上，傅正義獲得“終生成就獎”。

sentences.english: The activity ended with the issue of 2014 MEIJU Award.
sentences.chinese: 活動最後在2014美居獎設計項目頒獎盛典中結束。

sentences.english: He was invited to present the prizes at the annual flower show.
sentences.chinese: 他受邀在一年一度的花展上頒獎。

sentences.english: This was at the 2001 Academy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 那是在2001年學院獎頒獎典禮上。

sentences.english: That summer, I could see why the Czar sent his men to give her a prize.
sentences.chinese: 在那個夏天，我明白沙皇爲什麼要派人來給她頒獎了。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I participated in the 4th Youth Technology Festival awards evening of WISCO.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我參加了武鋼第四屆青年科技節頒獎晚會。

sentences.english: Metallics were huge this year during the Acadvertising campaignemy Awards. Why are metallics so special?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼金屬色在今年頒獎典禮上這麼通行？

sentences.english: Requests must be made prior to the IDEA ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 請在國際設計優秀獎頒獎儀式前提出要求。

sentences.english: In addition, a major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: After the medal ceremony, I placed an ad in the local paper.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎儀式後，我在當地的報紙登了一個啓示。

sentences.english: This year the event will be held in the brand-new Kodak Theater.
sentences.chinese: 今年的頒獎典禮將在嶄新的柯達劇院舉行。

sentences.english: At the award ceremony after the celebration party on.
sentences.chinese: 在頒獎禮後的慶功宴上。

sentences.english: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to our school prize-giving.
sentences.chinese: 女士們，先生們，歡迎參加我們學校的頒獎儀式。

sentences.english: When were gold, silver and bronze medals awarded?

definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
